description: two young men at right, wearing suite; young man at right peers over the top of a hat; young man at left holds a hat in front of his face and is seated on a plaid pail; another young man seen from back at LLC; bearded man to right of last young man; seated children at left; same image as L2005.98.4
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Stamp

see Sign on back, in pencil: [1954 NEW YORK, USA 54-2-1-1]
title: 1954, Brooklyn, New York, U.S.A.
